title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display a field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the content type does not have any effect on how the text is displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a db field with the three types of content mentioned above. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. 3. Observe that the content type does not affect how the text is displayed.
